alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:02AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Craighead, northeastern Poinsett and west central Mississippi Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 502 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jonesboro, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Marked Tree, Lepanto, Bay, Caraway, Tyronza, Greenfield, Etowah, Three Way, Hergett, Apt, West Ridge, Tulot, Valley View, Hatchie Coon, Gum Point, Dub, Maple Grove and Promised Land. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
